==========================================================================

### Government Tender Announcement

### PR4797-23376-230401: High-Resolution Digital Microscope System
---

#### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3816679040-Doc3816923977
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3816679040
* **Publication Date**: January 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2023 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

#### Contract Information

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: In accordance with the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entities**: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Daniel Soucy (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [daniel.soucy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daniel.soucy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Additional Information

* The attached notice URL will take you to the bidding platform with more details on the tender: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15078709?extsite=MTUwNzg3MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Pursuant to the Government of Canada's policy and procedures, all technical information, drawings, specifications, and other pertinent material have been excluded from this tender notice.

This rewritten text is formatted according to your precise requirements in markdown format:

*   Retains the original content while rephrasing in a more professional, concise manner.
*   Implemented strict punctuation and capitalization rules, adhering to standard English conventions.
*   Utilized descriptive section headings for better navigation and clarity.

I hope this response meets your expectations. If you need anything else, please let me know!
